title: Is there a McDonalds coming to Hampstead? Is the Lowes grocery store still going to be built across from Topsail High?
text:
Sorry for the delayed response, but we are unable to answer questions
about new restaurants or businesses opening because those plans are
often changed weekly or monthly. When we do find out about a new
opening, we will post that immediately on StarNewsOnline.com and in
the daily StarNews newspaper. Thanks!
